title: Pesticide Needed to Kill 50 Percent Based on Graph

content.description: The graph below represents the dose response curves of insect pests for four different pesticides.
content.question: A farmer needs to kill more than half of the insect crop pests to ensure a profitable harvest. Based on the graph, what is the minimum concentration of pesticide <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> that the farmer must use to make a profit?

choices.label: <math alttext="50 grams per cubic centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mtext>/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="500 grams per cubic centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>500</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mtext>/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1,000 grams per cubic centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,000</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mtext>/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1,500 grams per cubic centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,500</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mtext>/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1,500 grams per cubic centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,500</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mtext>/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
